attributes.action: Justice for Yusuf Sarwar (22 years old)
attributes.additional_details:
The sentence for Yusuf Sarwar is unjust and unfair especially compared to others that have travelled to Syria and returned to the UK.

Those who know Yusuf know that he is young, caring and sweet which also makes him vulnerable and susceptible.

In his mind, he went over to help citizens against the dictatorship regime.

This Government must find other means of challenging people's view and behaviour and help reintegrate them back into Society rather then isolate them by locking them up.

Please help Yusuf by signing this petition. We need 100,000 signatures for the Government to sit up and take notice.

Your help and support is much needed and appreciated.
